h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
img_above_text:
# The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
## Upper Pagoda (Level 3)
From the Upper Pagoda Shrine, your journey to the top will continue. A singular path will lie on the outdoor ring that you can progress across.

You can also try launching yourself to the archer in the window, by jumping and using a midair heavy attack to give yourself a boost over to the window... but do note that he's not alone.

img_summary:
### Summary of the Image:

The image depicts a tense combat encounter within the Upper Pagoda (Level 3) of the Pagoda Realm. A player character, wielding a fiery weapon, faces off against a menacing enemy armed with a spear in a dimly lit environment. The scene is framed by glowing green energy and scattered sparks, suggesting an intense battle. This aligns with the preceding text, which describes navigating the outdoor ring of the shrine and engaging enemies, including an archer in a window. The image visually conveys the challenges and hostile encounters players face as they progress through the shrine.
